channel.title: skill on Blog of Kai
channel.description: Recent content in skill on Blog of Kai

item.title: How do I set nudge distance in Illustrator?
item.description: Setting nudge distance/keyboard increment Uncheck snap to pixel in the view tab Change the keyboard increment in the Edit tab ->preference from 1 pixel(by fault) to a tiny one which you want.

Industrial Ecology The MSc Industrial Ecology (joint degree Leiden University and TU Delft) is an interdisciplinary and international programme, which focuses on the analysis of sustainability problems and the design and implementation of solutions for these problems; all from a socio-technical system perspective.

item.title: Why Was My Paper Rejected without Review?
item.description: A guidance highlighting why your paper was rejected by Environmental Science & Technology and what basic characteristics your paper should possess so it can move forward.

item.title: Moving the cursor point in word
item.description: The text you type appears wherever the insertion/cursor point is positioned in the current document.

item.title: How to edit/modify/customise Endnote references styles?
item.description: You will only be able to edit the style if the style is saved to your computer.

item.title: PhD transferable skills
item.description: Here are examples of PhD skill sets and ways to describe them by University of Michigan.

item.title: Writing your dissertation - working with your supervisor
item.description: Source Your supervisor Before you begin your dissertation, it is highly likely you will be assigned a supervisor to oversee your progress from first steps to completion.

item.title: Changing Fonts in hugo website
item.description: Thanks to Damien. I got new hugo shortcodes for the fonts update in this website.

item.title: Make Your Website Social Media Card
item.description: Make Your Website Social Media Card-able on Twitter, Facebook and More See the original link

item.title: Hugo Figure Shortcode
item.description: Hugo has figure shortcode built-in, so you can easily add figure captions or hyperlink rel attributes to images.

item.title: Rich Content -- Bult-in Shortcode
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.
